definition[0]: in order to make something happen, make something possible etc
example[0]: He lowered his voice so Doris couldn’t hear.
example[1]: Why don’t you start out early so that you don’t have to hurry?
definition[1]: used to say that something happens or is true as a result of the situation you have just stated
example[2]: There are no buses, so you’ll have to walk.
example[3]: The gravestones were covered with moss, so that it was impossible to read the names on them.
